name: Kilo Charlie Aviation
about: Kilo Charlie Aviation, based in Kansas City, is a premier flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and accelerated aviation training. Our Career Pilot Program moves students through various levels of flight knowledge, from private pilot to multi-engine instructor, in as little as 7 months. With a rigorous curriculum of classroom, simulator, and in-flight training, our instructional staff emphasizes safety and professionalism. We offer financing options through Meritize and other partners, and our programs include up to 290 logged hours, modern aircraft, and all necessary training materials. International students are welcome through the Alien Flight Student Program. We also provide convenient and comfortable student housing options. At Kilo Charlie Aviation, our mission is to give you the knowledge and training to become one of the finest aviation professionals in the world.
